channel.title: Comments on: My Online Will Idea – Not So Far Fetched
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
1. I just thought about what would happen to all my accounts if I die. 2. I'm an engineer... if there's an interesting problem I'm inclined to try and find a (general) solution 3. Right... I said "interesting" :)
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
1. I just thought about what would happen to all my accounts if I die.
2. I’m an engineer… if there’s an interesting problem I’m inclined to try and find a (general) solution
3. Right… I said “interesting” :)

Thanks.

item.title: By: Shahar Kuchuk
item.dc:creator: Shahar Kuchuk
item.description: 1. What made you think about an online will? 2. After thinking about it what made you develop it to that extent? 3. You should really think of a device imaging one's thoughts and playing them on TV
item.content:encoded:
1. What made you think about an online will?
2. After thinking about it what made you develop it to that extent?
3. You should really think of a device imaging one’s thoughts and playing them on TV
